title: Rich sweet potato pie
ingredients: ['500g cooked and mashed sweet potatoes', '60g butter, softened', '2 eggs, separated', '110g brown soft sugar', '1 pinch of salt', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '125ml evaporated milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 (23cm) pastry case']
